mapper.select: SELECT p.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, SUM(l.QTY) AS QTY FROM PRODUCTS p JOIN LOTS l ON p.LOTS_ID = l.LOT_ID WHERE l.SHELF_LIFE_DAYS >= SYSDATE GROUP BY p.PRODUCT_NAME

SELECT fp.fp_id, fp.serial_code, fp.name, NVL(st.total_qty, 0) AS stock_qty FROM fixed_product fp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.product_name, SUM(l.qty) AS total_qty FROM products p JOIN lots l ON p.lots_id = l.lot_id WHERE l.shelf_life_days >= SYSDATE GROUP BY p.product_name ) st ON fp.name = st.product_name

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, l.lot_id, l.qty, l.unit, TO_CHAR(l.storage_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as storage_date, TO_CHAR(l.shelf_life_days, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as shelf_life_days, TRUNC(l.shelf_life_days - SYSDATE) as days_left, l.note FROM Products p INNER JOIN Lots l ON p.lots_id = l.lot_id WHERE 1=1 AND l.shelf_life_days - SYSDATE >= -7
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY
p.product_name l.storage_date l.qty l.shelf_life_days
DESC ASC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Products p INNER JOIN Lots l ON p.lots_id = l.lot_id WHERE 1=1 AND l.shelf_life_days - SYSDATE >= -7
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT NVL(SUM(l.qty), 0) FROM Products p INNER JOIN Lots l ON p.lots_id = l.lot_id INNER JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON p.product_name = fp.name WHERE l.shelf_life_days >= SYSDATE AND fp.serial_code = #{serialCode}

SELECT fm.fm_id, fm.name as material_name, fm.qty as required_qty, fm.unit, 0 as current_stock FROM Fixed_Material fm WHERE fm.fp_id = ( SELECT fp_id FROM Fixed_Product WHERE serial_code = #{serialCode} )
select name, life_time from fixed_product where fp_id = #{fpId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Products (product_id, product_name, production_loss, pr_id, lots_id) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCTS.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{loss}, #{prId}, #{lotsId})

select product_id, serial_code, product_name, qty, unit, storage_date, shelf_life_days from products p left join fixed_product fp on p.product_name = fp.name left join lots l on p.lots_id = l.lot_id
${column} like '%' || #{search} || '%'
storage_date = #{date}
order by ${sort} ${order} offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{limit} rows only

select product_name as name, request_date as requestDate, sum(planned_qty) as demand from production_request pr join products p on pr.pr_id = p.pr_id left join lots l on p.lots_id = l.lot_id group by product_name, request_date order by request_date asc
mapper.update: UPDATE Lots l SET l.qty = l.qty - #{qty} WHERE l.lot_id IN ( SELECT p.lots_id FROM Products p INNER JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON p.product_name = fp.name WHERE fp.serial_code = #{serialCode} AND l.qty > 0 ORDER BY l.storage_date ASC ) AND ROWNUM = 1
